lines.text: I don't think <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> tells us anything about the body's identity...
Like, he's not moving, but I think that's because of the dead thing. Not because of magic.
I mean, probably because of magic, but because the magic caused the being dead.
I mean, obviously magic was like, involved here, but y'know.
Okay, I get it. Something else, then.
